snippet.title: Block Fortress Trailer [Minecraft + Tower Defense]
snippet.description: Block Fortress is an iOS exclusive game that combines the freedom and creativity of block-building games like Minecraft, the strategy of tower defense, and the action of first-person shooters into one totally unique gaming experience. It offers more than 30 different building blocks, 16 different turret blocks, and tons of additional items to build (including mining blocks, lumber blocks, storage crates, power generators, and much more). It also includes many different weapon and item upgrades for your character - all brought to bear against the relentless attacks of the Goblocks!
